root.texto: If anyone was curious about Edward Snowden & where he aligns with the rest of the world, look no further than his backers. Alex & George Soros, Jack Dorsey & The ACLU. https://t.co/wqBHIjNBdn #QAnon #Soros #JackDorsey #Snowden #ACLU #TruthAndTreason https://t.co/r2SDMbb5NS The Pardon Snowden Campaign is funded by Many Big Name Globalist NWO types to include Alex and George Soros, Jack Dorsey & the ACLU. https://t.co/oDuuHjZu0P https://t.co/jKafIDvUQ0 Alex Soros brings in Edward Snowden to speak at and Open Society Foundation symposium last year. https://t.co/TpvRR2pgsF https://t.co/3Kkimfjroe It's clear that he's not an ignorant person, & complicit with Globalist of the likes of Soros & Censoring arm like Jack Dorsey who has silenced many of us. He is no friend to the US or any Anon. He's a #Blackhat plain & clear. https://t.co/k9z9yxv2hW https://t.co/jj3SMV8ou2 There is and has been a Secret War going on between the CIA & NSA for years. Mainly because the NSA was the covert electronic surveillance arm of the US govt & the CIA was established as the covert HUMINT arm of the US govt & Snowden is right in the middle https://t.co/2Q1eY8eRnU https://t.co/9yxuVxNY47 @threadreaderapp Unroll please!! #MakeItSnappy üëçüòÅ
